WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS
   UNTIL 26 SEP BY M/V OCEANIC VEGA
   TOWING 12 12964 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   26-13.07S 041-34.32W, 25-23.50S 042-04.40W,
   25-36.80S 042-33.45W, 25-37.05S 042-55.97W,
   25-47.42S 043-17.20W, 25-47.78S 044-14.55W,
   26-01.02S 044-40.73W, 26-30.78S 045-28.95W,
   26-41.98S 045-35.35W, 26-31.25S 044-23.35W,
   27-26.03S 045-10.17W, 27-23.27S 041-31.80W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2.CANCEL THIS MSG 270001Z SEP 22.
